QuestData.Title: Clam Bait
QuestData.Description: You have the look of a fisherman, $c! I love to fish - been fishing all my life. The best bait to use is soft-shelled clam meat; the fish just can't resist, you know what I mean?$B$BUp north you will find a wrecked ship off the coast. Soft-shelled clams are littered throughout the area. If you bring me back 10 pieces of soft-shelled clam meat, I will give you something in return.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find 10 pieces of Soft-shelled Clam Meat and bring it back to Mai'Lahii at Shadowprey Village.
QuestData.CompletionText: I can't wait to go fishing with some fresh soft-shelled clam meat; did you bring me the 10 pieces of it I need?
QuestData.RewardText:
Perfect mon, this is just what the witch doctor told me to do for my headache. He says, "Mai'Lahii - go fish. It'll make you feel better"
Well, I feel better already, thanks mon!
